StringTable.Label: Event_AncientArtifact_Name
StringTable.String: Ancient Artifact

StringTable.Label: Event_AncientArtifact_Dec
StringTable.String: Our explorers have discovered an ancient artifact of unknown origin. Some believe it holds the key to unlocking advanced technology, while others argue that it is a relic of our ancestors and should be preserved.[BR][BR]What should we do with this artifact?

StringTable.Label: Event_AncientArtifact_Opportunity_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Study the artifact for technological advancements.

StringTable.Label: Event_AncientArtifact_Tradition_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Preserve the artifact as a symbol of our heritage.

StringTable.Label: Event_SpaceWhaleMigration_Name
StringTable.String: Space Creature Migration

StringTable.Label: Event_SpaceWhaleMigration_Dec
StringTable.String: A massive migration of strange space creatures are migrating through our territory. They are creating havoc in their wake. There is a great deal of political pressure on us to eliminate these creatures but we have heard you have a fondness for these kinds of things.

StringTable.Label: Event_SpaceWhaleMigration_Compassion_Name
StringTable.String: Protect the creatures

StringTable.Label: Event_SpaceWhaleMigration_Compassion_Dec
StringTable.String: We will protect the space creatures and ensure their safe passage, earning the goodwill of other compassionate factions.

StringTable.Label: Event_SpaceWhaleMigrationCompassion_String1
StringTable.String: You protected the space whales

StringTable.Label: Event_SpaceWhaleMigration_Pragmatism_Name
StringTable.String: I have a better idea, we'll slaughter these creatures and extract new knowledge from them.

StringTable.Label: Event_SpaceWhaleMigration_Pragmatism_Dec
StringTable.String: These creatures won't suffer too much. Probably.

StringTable.Label: Event_TechnologyExchange_Name
StringTable.String: Technology Exchange

StringTable.Label: Event_TechnologyExchange_Dec
StringTable.String: Our heroic explorers have come across a Precursor artifact left behind by the so-called Arnor. We are not able to make sense of it. It was suggested to us that you might be able to figure it out. We are willing to let you look at it provided that you share what you discover with us.

StringTable.Label: Event_TechnologyExchange_Cooperation_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Accept the exchange knowing that it will benefit them more.

StringTable.Label: Event_TechnologyExchange_Cooperation_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: By accepting the technology exchange, we gain +25 research units. However, they gained much more.

StringTable.Label: Event_TechnologyExchange_Cooperation_String1
StringTable.String: You accepted the technology exchange

StringTable.Label: Event_TechnologyExchange_Cooperation_String2
StringTable.String: Your team will look at the artifact and suffer an acute case of butter fingers. -3 Relations with the {PLAYERFACTION:1} for 20 months. +25 Research for you.

StringTable.Label: Event_TechnologyExchange_Independence_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Agree to look at the artifact and then 'accidentally' destroy it.

StringTable.Label: Event_TechnologyExchange_Droppedit
StringTable.String: You purposely ruined our artifact.

StringTable.Label: Event_TechnologyExchange_Isolation_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We are too busy for this.

StringTable.Label: Event_TechnologyExchange_Isolation_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: By declining the technology exchange and isolating ourselves, we may strain diplomatic relations but can focus on our own path. -1 Relations with the {PLAYERFACTION:1} for 20 months

StringTable.Label: Event_TechnologyExchange_Isolation_String1
StringTable.String: You declined to help us on the artifact.

StringTable.Label: Event_AlternateEnergy_Name
StringTable.String: Alternate Energy Source

StringTable.Label: Event_AlternateEnergy_Desc
StringTable.String: Our civilization has recently discovered an alternate energy source, which we believe will revolutionize our industries. However, the energy source requires Elerium, a rare resource in our territory. We are requesting your help to develop this energy source. In return, we will share the benefits with your civilization.

StringTable.Label: Event_AlternateEnergy_Innovation_Name
StringTable.String: Provide Elerium for research even if we have to borrow some.

StringTable.Label: Event_AlternateEnergy_Innovation_Bonus
StringTable.String: Elerium Energy System

StringTable.Label: Event_AlternateEnergy_Innovation_Dec
StringTable.String: +1 Relations with the {PLAYERFACTION:1} for 50 months.

StringTable.Label: Event_AlternateEnergy_Tradition_Name
StringTable.String: We'd totally love to help with this project but we don't want to..

StringTable.Label: Event_AlternateEnergy_Tradition_Dec
StringTable.String: -1 Relations with the {PLAYERFACTION:1} for 25 months.

StringTable.Label: Event_AlternateEnergy_Tradition_String1
StringTable.String: You didn't help us with the Elerium project.

StringTable.Label: Event_AlternateEnergy_Innovation_String1
StringTable.String: You helped us with the Elerium project.

StringTable.Label: Event_Refugees_Name_5XA
StringTable.String: Refugees of disaster

StringTable.Label: Event_Refugees_Dec_5XA
StringTable.String: Our home planet is suffering from a devastating natural disaster. Thousands of our people have been displaced and are seeking refuge. We ask for your assistance in this desperate time. Will you accept these refugees and help them find a new home?

StringTable.Label: Event_Refugees_Compassion_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Accept the refugees.

StringTable.Label: Event_Refugees_Compassion_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: +1 to relations..

StringTable.Label: Event_RefugeesCompassion_String1
StringTable.String: You accepted our refugees.

StringTable.Label: Event_Refugees_Cruelty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: I have a better idea. We will pick them up and put them to work as slaves.

StringTable.Label: Event_Refugees_Cruelty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: Sell them off to one of your people for 300 credits. -2 Relations with the {PLAYERFACTION:1} for 50 months

StringTable.Label: Event_RefugeesCruelty_String1
StringTable.String: You enslaved our refugees!

StringTable.Label: Event_DisputedTerritory_Name
StringTable.String: Disputed Territory

StringTable.Label: Event_DisputedTerritory_Dec
StringTable.String: Our territory contains a disputed region rich in resources. Unfortunately, a rival political faction on our world is also claiming it as their own. We are open to negotiation, but we need your support. If you back our claim, we will share the resources with you. However, if you remain neutral, we may not be able to maintain a friendly relationship.

StringTable.Label: Event_DisputedTerritory_Compassion_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Support their claim and share the resources hoping that the rival faction never gains power.

StringTable.Label: Event_DisputedTerritory_Compassion_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: +1 Relations with the {PLAYERFACTION:1} for 75 turns.

StringTable.Label: Event_DisputedTerritoryCompassion_String1
StringTable.String: You supported my claim to the disputed territory

StringTable.Label: Event_DisputedTerritory_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Remain neutral and let them handle the dispute.

StringTable.Label: Event_DisputedTerritory_Authority_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: -2 Relations with the {PLAYERFACTION:1} for 25 months

StringTable.Label: Event_DisputedTerritoryAuthority_String1
StringTable.String: You remained neutral in the disputed territory

StringTable.Label: Event_DamagedTradeShip_Name
StringTable.String: Damaged Trade Ship

StringTable.Label: Event_DamagedTradeShip_Dec
StringTable.String: One of our freighters from homeworld has been damaged by an ion storm leaving it stranded in deep space near your territory. We would like some assistance.

StringTable.Label: Event_DamagedTradeShip_Compassion_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Send assistance to the stranded ship.

StringTable.Label: Event_DamagedTradeShip_Compassion_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: +1 Relations with the {PLAYERFACTION:1} for 50 months

StringTable.Label: Event_DamagedTradeShipCompassion_String1
StringTable.String: You sent assistance to our stranded trade ship

StringTable.Label: Event_DamagedTradeShip_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Seize the opportunity to tax their cargo.

StringTable.Label: Event_DamagedTradeShip_Authority_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: +300 credits and -2 Relations with the {PLAYERFACTION:1} for 50 months

StringTable.Label: Event_DamagedTradeShipAuthority_String1
StringTable.String: You seized our freighter.

StringTable.Label: Event_AncientArtifact_Name_0X56CB
StringTable.String: The Dreadlord Artifact

StringTable.Label: Event_AncientArtifact_Dec_0X56CB
StringTable.String: We have come across some sort of device left behind by the Dread Lords. We are not quite certain what it is and wanted to see if one of your researchers would be willing to review it.

StringTable.Label: Event_AncientArtifact_Authority_Bonus_Name_0X56CB
StringTable.String: Take the artifact and activate it.

StringTable.Label: Event_AncientArtifact_Authority_Bonus_Dec_0X56CB
StringTable.String: Unknown but -1 Relations with the {PLAYERFACTION:1} for 50 months

StringTable.Label: Event_AncientArtifactAuthority_String1_0X56CB
StringTable.String: You kept the ancient artifact for yourself

StringTable.Label: Event_AncientArtifact_Compassion_Bonus_Name_0X56CB
StringTable.String: Create a joint task force to study the artifact.

StringTable.Label: Event_AncientArtifact_Compassion_Bonus_Dec_0X56CB
StringTable.String: +1 Relations with the {PLAYERFACTION:1} for 50 months

StringTable.Label: Event_AncientArtifactCompassion_String1_0X56CB
StringTable.String: The Artifact task force.

StringTable.Label: Event_RefugeeCrisis_Name_0X56CD
StringTable.String: Failed Colonization Effort

StringTable.Label: Event_RefugeeCrisis_Dec_0X56CD
StringTable.String: Some of our people have decided to try to colonize worlds without our sanction. Their ship failed and the passengers are dead and the ship has drifted near your space. We ask that you recover the ship for us. You can keep what you find on the ship.

StringTable.Label: Event_RefugeeCrisis_Compassion_Bonus_Name_0X56CD
StringTable.String: Find and return the ship keeping the vast supply of goodies you find on the ship.

StringTable.Label: Event_RefugeeCrisis_Compassion_Bonus_Dec_0X56CD
StringTable.String: +1 Relations with the {PLAYERFACTION:1} for 50 months

StringTable.Label: Event_RefugeeCrisis_Compassion_Bonus_Stat_0X56CD
StringTable.String: Refugee Ship Goodies

StringTable.Label: Event_RefugeeCrisisCompassion_String1_0X56CD
StringTable.String: You returned our lost companions.

StringTable.Label: Event_RefugeeCrisis_Cruelty_Bonus_Name_0X56CD
StringTable.String: I think we'll just take the ship and the items on board.

StringTable.Label: Event_RefugeeCrisisEvil_String1_0X56CD
StringTable.String: You stole our goods!

StringTable.Label: Event_RefugeeCrisis_Evil_Bonus_Dec_0X56CD
StringTable.String: -1 Relations with the {PLAYERFACTION:1} for 50 months.

StringTable.Label: Event_CoupFugitive_Name_0X47AE
StringTable.String: Enemy of the state

StringTable.Label: Event_CoupFugitive_Dec_0X47AE
StringTable.String: One of our esteemed generals has dared to stage a coup against me! We have successfully thwarted his treacherous plans, but he has managed to evade our forces and has taken refuge on your homeworld. It is of the utmost importance that you cooperate in delivering this traitor back to us.

StringTable.Label: Event_CoupFugitive_Authority_Bonus_Name_0X47AE
StringTable.String: We will find and deliver the traitor

StringTable.Label: Event_CoupFugitive_Authority_Bonus_Dec_0X47AE
StringTable.String: +1 Relations with the {PLAYERFACTION:1} for 50 months

StringTable.Label: Event_CoupFugitive_Calm_Bonus_Dec_0X57AE
StringTable.String: This really isn't our problem. He can do what he wants..

StringTable.Label: Event_CoupFugitive_Calm_Bonus_Dec_0X47AE
StringTable.String: We irritate {PLAYERFACTION:1} and the fugitive's actions are a pain for awhile. But his antics result in a comedy show.

StringTable.Label: Event_CoupFugitive_Calm_Bonus_Stat_0X47AE
StringTable.String: Amusing fugitive

StringTable.Label: Event_CoupFugitiveAuthority_String1_0X47AE
StringTable.String: You gave us the head of our traitor.

StringTable.Label: Event_InvasiveSpecies_Name_0X47AB
StringTable.String: Invasive Species

StringTable.Label: Event_InvasiveSpecies_Dec_0X47AB
StringTable.String: We are getting reports of destruction due to pests that originated from your homeworld that are now on our world from imports. We demand you pay us 500 credits to cover the cost of repairing the environment.

StringTable.Label: Event_InvasiveSpecies_Comp_Bonus_Name_0X47AB
StringTable.String: Compensate for the damages.

StringTable.Label: Event_InvasiveSpecies_Cruel_Bonus_Name_0X47AB
StringTable.String: Not our problem.

StringTable.Label: Event_InvasiveSpecies_Comp_Bonus_Dec_0X47AB
StringTable.String: Pay them what they want. We give them a Monsantium Deposit and we lose one.

StringTable.Label: Event_InvasiveSpecies_Cruel_Bonus_Dec_0X47AB
StringTable.String: -1 Relations with the {PLAYERFACTION:1} for 50 months

StringTable.Label: Event_InvasiveSpecies_Cruel_String1_0X47AB
StringTable.String: Your bugs are damaging our world.

StringTable.Label: Event_CulturalInvasion_Name_0X9A7BC
StringTable.String: Cultural Invasion

StringTable.Label: Event_CulturalInvasion_Dec_0X9A7BC
StringTable.String: The relentless tide of your people's music and culture has inundated our worlds, permeating every corner of our society. Vibrant melodies and infectious rhythms echo through our streets, distracting our citizens and disrupting the harmony of our way of life. The colorful tapestry of your traditions and customs entwines with our own, threatening to unravel the very fabric of our civilization. We demand that you intervene and quell the storm.

StringTable.Label: Event_CulturalInvasion_Authority_Bonus_Name_0X9A7BC
StringTable.String: Impose strict cultural regulations.

StringTable.Label: Event_CulturalInvasion_Authority_Bonus_Dec_0X9A7BC
StringTable.String: We spend money and control but improve relations with the {PLAYERFACTION:1}.

StringTable.Label: Event_CulturalInvasionAuthority_String1_0X9A7BC
StringTable.String: You tooks steps to preserve our culture.

StringTable.Label: Event_CulturalInvasion_Compassion_Bonus_Name_0X9A7BC
StringTable.String: Promote cultural exchange whereby we actively promote their culture with our people.

StringTable.Label: Event_CulturalInvasion_Compassion_Bonus_Dec_0X9A7BC
StringTable.String: Promote cultural exchange whereby we actively promote their culture with our people. This will lower our influence generation..

StringTable.Label: Event_CulturalInvasion_Calm_Bonus_Name_0X9A7BC
StringTable.String: We'll license our music to native performers.

StringTable.Label: Event_CulturalInvasion_Calm_Bonus_Dec_0X9A7BC
StringTable.String: We improve people's moods on both sides.

StringTable.Label: Event_CulturalInvasion_Calm_Bonus_Stat_0X9A7BC
StringTable.String: Cultural Exchange Program

StringTable.Label: Event_CulturalInvasionCalm_String1_0X9A7BC
StringTable.String: Our people enjoy your music.

StringTable.Label: Event_CulturalInvasion_Compassion_Bonus_Stat_0X9A7BC
StringTable.String: Foreign Exchange Agreement

StringTable.Label: Event_CultureExchange_Name_0X9A7BC
StringTable.String: Cultural Exchange Festival

StringTable.Label: Event_CultureExchange_Dec_0X9A7BC
StringTable.String: We have a proposal for you. In the interest of peace we would like to hold a Cultural Exchange Festival. The are art, music, and traditions from both civilizations might promote understanding and unity.

StringTable.Label: Event_CultureExchange_Choice1_0X9A7BC
StringTable.String: Agree to the Festival

StringTable.Label: Event_CultureExchange_Choice1_Dec_0X9A7BC
StringTable.String: We have decided to promote the event, expecting an influx of tourists and a boost in cultural appreciation. However, we will have to spend some control to manage the diverse crowd.

StringTable.Label: Event_CultureExchange_Choice2_0X9A7BC
StringTable.String: Decline the Proposal

StringTable.Label: Event_CultureExchange_Choice2_Dec_0X9A7BC
StringTable.String: We have decided against the cultural festival. We prioritize our internal peace and stability. This decision, however, may not sit well with the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1}.

StringTable.Label: Event_CultureExchange_Diplomatic_0X9A7BC
StringTable.String: You declined our festival proposal

StringTable.Label: Event_CivPilgrimage_0x49B2_Name
StringTable.String: The Pilgrimage Proposal

StringTable.Label: Event_CivPilgrimage_0x49B2_Dec
StringTable.String: Our people are very spiritual. There are areas within your sphere of influence that our people believe connect them to the ancient Mithilar. Would you allow them to pass through your territory? We would appreciate it.

StringTable.Label: Event_CivPilgrimage_0x49B2_Choice1_Name
StringTable.String: Allow the Pilgrimage.

StringTable.Label: Event_CivPilgrimage_0x49B2_Choice1_Dec
StringTable.String: Αναγνωρίζοντας την πνευματική σημασία και σεβόμενοι τις παραδόσεις τους, τους έχουμε χορηγήσει άδεια για το προσκύνημα. Θα κοστίσει κάποιο έλεγχο για να διασφαλιστεί η ασφάλειά τους.

StringTable.Label: Event_CivPilgrimage_0x49B2_Choice2_Name
StringTable.String: Όχι. Δεν νομίζω..

StringTable.Label: Event_CivPilgrimage_0x49B2_Choice2_Dec
StringTable.String: Το τελευταίο πράγμα που χρειαζόμαστε είναι μια ομάδα εξωγήινων κατασκόπων που ταξιδεύουν μέσα στο διάστημά μας..

StringTable.Label: Event_CivPilgrimage_GoodDiplomaticReason_0x49B2
StringTable.String: Ευγνώμον για την Έγκριση της Προσκυνηματικής Εκδρομής.

StringTable.Label: Event_CivPilgrimage_NegativeDiplomaticReason_0x49B2
StringTable.String: Απογοητευμένος από την Άρνηση Προσκυνήματος.

StringTable.Label: Event_FeastProposal_0x15E9_Name
StringTable.String: Το Τρομερό Αίτημα

StringTable.Label: Event_FeastProposal_0x15E9_Dec
StringTable.String: We, the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1}, are approaching a significant period in our lifecycle — our sacred mating ritual.[BR][BR]For the ritual's success, we require sentients to feast upon. We would like you to provide these sentients. You can gather them from your prisons if that helps you justify it. But its importance to our kind cannot be overstated. Will you offer this gesture of goodwill?

StringTable.Label: Event_FeastProposal_0x15E9_Choice1_Name
StringTable.String: Fine. Round up some criminals to feed to them.

StringTable.Label: Event_FeastProposal_0x15E9_Choice1_Dec
StringTable.String: The choice will surely cause unrest among our people. But it will improve relations at least. For now.

StringTable.Label: Event_FeastProposal_0x15E9_Choice2_Name
StringTable.String: Absolutely not.

StringTable.Label: Event_FeastProposal_0x15E9_Choice2_Dec
StringTable.String: They will be unhappy with this choice but our people will still respect you just as little tomorrow..

StringTable.Label: Event_FeastProposal_PositiveDiplomaticReason_0x15E9
StringTable.String: You supported our flesh festival

StringTable.Label: Event_FeastProposal_NegativeDiplomaticReason_0x15E9
StringTable.String: You ruined our festival

StringTable.Label: Event_SportRequest_0x23F4_Name
StringTable.String: The Bloody Proposal

StringTable.Label: Event_SportRequest_0x23F4_Dec
StringTable.String: We, the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1}, have a long-standing tradition of games that test the true capabilities of one's physique and mental prowess. For warm up, your weak species would be well advised to provide some specimens for our warriors to practice on.

StringTable.Label: Event_SportRequest_0x23F4_Choice1_Name
StringTable.String: Only if I get to watch.

StringTable.Label: Event_SportRequest_0x23F4_Choice1_Dec
StringTable.String: Our people will likely be horrified by this decision, but it may prevent further conflict with the cruel {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1}.

StringTable.Label: Event_SportRequest_0x23F4_Choice2_Name
StringTable.String: Refuse their vile proposal

StringTable.Label: Event_SportRequest_0x23F4_Choice2_Dec
StringTable.String: While our people will be relieved, this might further sour our relations with them.

StringTable.Label: Event_SportRequest_PositiveDiplomaticReason_0x23F4
StringTable.String: You know your place

StringTable.Label: Event_SportRequest_NegativeDiplomaticReason_0x23F4
StringTable.String: You have too much spine

StringTable.Label: Event_SubmersionFestival_0x3C4D_Name
StringTable.String: Deepwater Festival

StringTable.Label: Event_SubmersionFestival_0x3C4D_Dec
StringTable.String: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} cordially invites your people to join our Deepwater Festival, a celebration of our amphibious heritage. We request some of your best swimmers to experience the depth of our oceans. It's a unique, once-in-a-lifetime opportunity. But, we must admit, it comes with some risks. [BR][BR]Will you accept?

StringTable.Label: Event_SubmersionFestival_0x3C4D_Choice1_Name
StringTable.String: We will send volunteers.

StringTable.Label: Event_SubmersionFestival_0x3C4D_Choice1_Dec
StringTable.String: It's an opportunity for cultural exchange but also some risk if any of our swimmers die.

StringTable.Label: Event_SubmersionFestival_0x3C4D_Choice2_Name
StringTable.String: This is too dangerous for us to participate in.

StringTable.Label: Event_SubmersionFestival_0x3C4D_Choice2_Dec
StringTable.String: Even though we have some people who would jump at the chance to participate, the scandal if something went wrong would be a disaster.

StringTable.Label: Event_SubmersionFestival_PositiveDiplomaticReason_0x3C4D
StringTable.String: You are good swimmers

StringTable.Label: Event_SubmersionFestival_NegativeDiplomaticReason_0x3C4D
StringTable.String: You are cowardly

StringTable.Label: Event_OceanExploration_0x4F5A_Name
StringTable.String: Deep Water

StringTable.Label: Event_OceanExploration_0x4F5A_Dec
StringTable.String: Our people, the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1}, have a profound connection to water. We wish to explore the depths of your oceans, study its inhabitants, and understand its mysteries.[BR][BR]We assure you, our intentions are purely scientific. Would you permit us?

StringTable.Label: Event_OceanExploration_0x4F5A_Choice1_Name
StringTable.String: This sounds great.

StringTable.Label: Event_OceanExploration_0x4F5A_Choice1_Dec
StringTable.String: It's a step towards interstellar cooperation, but our coastal communities are particularly wary.

StringTable.Label: Event_OceanExploration_0x4F5A_Choice2_Name
StringTable.String: No. Our worlds are not open for this.

StringTable.Label: Event_OceanExploration_0x4F5A_Choice2_Dec
StringTable.String: We value our autonomy and the sentiments of our people. The seas remain ours alone.

StringTable.Label: Event_OceanExploration_PositiveDiplomaticReason_0x4F5A
StringTable.String: You granted us ocean access

StringTable.Label: Event_OceanExploration_NegativeDiplomaticReason_0x4F5A
StringTable.String: You denied us your oceans

StringTable.Label: Event_DevoutShrines_0x5A1B_Name
StringTable.String: The Way

StringTable.Label: Event_DevoutShrines_0x5A1B_Dec
StringTable.String: As you know the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1}, have been enlightened by The Way. We wish to bring you salvation by setting up shrines on your planets, teaching your people of our sacred beliefs. Embrace The Way and allow us to guide you to the true path. Do you accept?

StringTable.Label: Event_DevoutShrines_0x5A1B_Choice1_Name
StringTable.String: Very well. Set up your shrines.

StringTable.Label: Event_DevoutShrines_0x5A1B_Choice1_Dec
StringTable.String: This will reduce our cultural influence growth for a time.

StringTable.Label: Event_DevoutShrines_0x5A1B_Choice2_Name
StringTable.String: Our people are not interested.

StringTable.Label: Event_DevoutShrines_0x5A1B_Choice2_Dec
StringTable.String: They may not take this rejection lightly, but our influence remains undiminished.

StringTable.Label: Event_DevoutShrines_PositiveDiplomaticReason_0x5A1B
StringTable.String: You embraced The Way

StringTable.Label: Event_DevoutShrines_NegativeDiplomaticReason_0x5A1B
StringTable.String: You rejected The Way

StringTable.Label: Event_DreamSpyingAccusation_0x8C3D_Name
StringTable.String: Dream Spies

StringTable.Label: Event_DreamSpyingAccusation_0x8C3D_Dec
StringTable.String: We've been watching you. We know your people have been infiltrating the dreams of the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1}. We're not crazy. [BR][BR]We demand 10 units of Antimatter to build a device to shield our minds from your prying.

StringTable.Label: Event_DreamSpyingAccusation_0x8C3D_Choice1_Name
StringTable.String: You can have the Antimatter but I doubt it will help.

StringTable.Label: Event_DreamSpyingAccusation_0x8C3D_Choice1_Dec
StringTable.String: While the claims are baseless, this might be the way to keep the peace.

StringTable.Label: Event_DreamSpyingAccusation_0x8C3D_Choice2_Name
StringTable.String: If you have to say you're not crazy...

StringTable.Label: Event_DreamSpyingAccusation_0x8C3D_Choice2_Dec
StringTable.String: They might be furious, but we won't be bullied based on delusions.

StringTable.Label: Event_DreamSpyingAccusation_PositiveDiplomaticReason_0x8C3D
StringTable.String: You're not spying on our dreams

StringTable.Label: Event_DreamSpyingAccusation_NegativeDiplomaticReason_0x8C3D
StringTable.String: You are spying on our dreams

StringTable.Label: Event_WarProfiteerDeal_0xA12F_Name
StringTable.String: Weapons of War

StringTable.Label: Event_WarProfiteerDeal_0xA12F_Dec
StringTable.String: We, the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1}, have come across some... extra military hardware. We thought you might be interested. These arms will significantly bolster your weapons capabilities. However, remember, such deals remain between us. Do we have an agreement?

StringTable.Label: Event_WarProfiteerDeal_0xA12F_Choice1_Name
StringTable.String: Better weapons on our ships? Yes. Yes please.

StringTable.Label: Event_WarProfiteerDeal_0xA12F_Choice1_Dec
StringTable.String: These weapons will help but they will lower our overall diplomatic ability.

StringTable.Label: Event_WarProfiteerDeal_0xA12F_Choice2_Name
StringTable.String: We must pass on this.

StringTable.Label: Event_WarProfiteerDeal_0xA12F_Choice2_Dec
StringTable.String: We are not in the habit of installing strange weapons from foreign governments.

StringTable.Label: Event_WarProfiteerDeal_PositiveDiplomaticReason_0xA12F
StringTable.String: You like our weapons

StringTable.Label: Event_WarProfiteerDeal_NegativeDiplomaticReason_0xA12F
StringTable.String: You are dumb

StringTable.Label: Event_TraderDeal_0xC45D_Name
StringTable.String: Special Offer

StringTable.Label: Event_TraderDeal_0xC45D_Dec
StringTable.String: We, the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1}, have a limited time offer for you. A rare Harmony Crystal, known to enhance the wellbeing and productivity of colonies or something. All we ask for in return is a modest sum.

StringTable.Label: Event_TraderDeal_0xC45D_Choice1_Name
StringTable.String: Take the deal

StringTable.Label: Event_TraderDeal_0xC45D_Choice1_Dec
StringTable.String: We can use this.

StringTable.Label: Event_TraderDeal_0xC45D_Choice2_Name
StringTable.String: We can't afford it right now.

StringTable.Label: Event_TraderDeal_0xC45D_Choice2_Dec
StringTable.String: Perhaps another time, when our coffers are more abundant.

StringTable.Label: Event_PersuasionOffer_0xC45E_Name
StringTable.String: Persuasion Workshop

StringTable.Label: Event_PersuasionOffer_0xC45E_Dec
StringTable.String: Our traders have honed the art of persuasion through countless dealings across the galaxy. For a fee we'd be willing to share some of these trade secrets with you. This knowledge could greatly benefit your future negotiations. Interested?

StringTable.Label: Event_PersuasionOffer_0xC45E_Choice1_Name
StringTable.String: Invest in the workshop

StringTable.Label: Event_PersuasionOffer_0xC45E_Choice1_Dec
StringTable.String: The art of persuasion is a valuable skill. We accept. We can use persuassion when trading to get better deals.

StringTable.Label: Event_PersuasionOffer_0xC45E_Choice2_Name
StringTable.String: Decline the offer

StringTable.Label: Event_PersuasionOffer_0xC45E_Choice2_Dec
StringTable.String: We will rely on our own methods of negotiation.

StringTable.Label: Event_CrystalResonance_0xC45F_Name
StringTable.String: Crystal Resonance

StringTable.Label: Event_CrystalResonance_0xC45F_Dec
StringTable.String: The {PLAYERFACTION:1} have come to you with a proposal. We can detect harmonics that are beyond your imagination. We are willing to share knowledge on how to detect these harmonics which should aid your science but in return we want access to some of your worlds that have unique crystalline formations.

StringTable.Label: Event_CrystalResonance_0xC45F_Choice1_Name
StringTable.String: Grant access.

StringTable.Label: Event_CrystalResonance_0xC45F_Choice1_Dec
StringTable.String: The ancient knowledge of the universe is invaluable. We accept.

StringTable.Label: Event_CrystalResonance_0xC45F_Choice2_Name
StringTable.String: No thank you.

StringTable.Label: Event_CrystalResonance_0xC45F_Choice2_Dec
StringTable.String: Our resources are for our own use. We cannot grant access. This may insult them.

StringTable.Label: Event_CrystalResonance_0xC45F_Diplomacy
StringTable.String: You chose...poorly
